description: This file defines the FundTransferService class which manages fund transfer operations within an internet banking application. It includes methods for processing fund transfers and retrieving transfer records, interacting with repositories and external services.

classes.name: FundTransferService
classes.description: Service class responsible for handling fund transfer logic, including saving transfer details, invoking external banking services, and retrieving transfer records.

methods.name: fundTransfer
methods.description: Processes a fund transfer request by saving initial transfer info, calling external banking service, updating transfer status, and returning a response.

methods.name: readAllTransfers
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all fund transfers, converted to DTOs for client consumption.
